data.description: X-Y plots with text at datapoints
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I needed the X-Y plotting features of Chart::Plot, but I also need
    to be able to put text into the image at each datapoint. This is a
    generalized solution that inherits all the utilities of Chart::Plot
    and adds the text by accessing the underlying GD object directly.
